Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Mandates that every owner of a cabaret establishment, but which is not a restaurant shall install security cameras
Summary: Enacts "Imette's Law"; mandates that every owner of a cabaret establishment, but which is not a restaurant, shall install security cameras at every entrance and exit of such establishment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to mandating the installation of security cameras in cabaret establishments
